sentences.sContent: My office is just along the passage.
sentences.sCn: 我的办公室就在过道旁边。

sentences.sContent: We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
sentences.sCn: 我们沿着一条狭窄的通道来到大楼的后面。

sentences.sContent: ...Each passage is followed by some questions or unfinished statements...
...If a particularly important passage is highlighted by multiple Inkling users...
...You are required to select one word for each blank from a list of choices given in a word bank following the passage: Read the passage through carefully before making your choices...
...Read the passage through carefully before making your choices...
...there is a passage with ten blanks...
...you are going to read a passage with ten statements attached to it...
